comment:
Sample from @Richard-ModernDrinking


Nose: Cherries, Raisins, Toffee, Chocolate, Cherry, Citrus, Strawberries, Raspberries, Honey, Salted Caramel, Pepper, Smoke, Almonds, Macadamian Nut, Flowers, Mango, Pineapple, Blondies, Guava

Palate: Cherries, Dates, Plums, Toffee, Chocolate, Smoke, Salt, Pepper, Berries, Dried Fruit, Citrus, Vanilla, Oak, Cinnamon, Diesel

Finish:  Salted Caramel, Banana, Chocolate, Citrus, Berries, Mango, Orange, Vanilla, Guava, Passion Fruit, Smoke, Ash

Great stuff, nice combination of sweetness and saltiness with smokiness and campbeltown funk tamed down to some nice elegance. Preferred this to the 9 year Sauternes cask from 2017.
Ez honey nose, sweet vanilla taste with spicy but mellow 4*.  Beth says it’s smoky
